title: THANK YOU RIOT!
body: Honestly thank you, thank you for now showing ogn, lpl, and even lms games on lolesports and recasts on youtube. i enjoy watching competetive league more than tv or any other thing and now that i can watch them basically nightly im overjoyed. thank you for making this possible.

replies.body: Thank you so much for watching and supporting the competitive scene, BuggzBrown!

Got a question, if you don't mind answering, is everyone's MMR being lowered on a global scale? I'm seeing threads popping up about people blowing through their provisionals, then falling from silver I to bronze III, or plat V to silver II, even though they won most of their provisional games. Are you attempting to weed out the weak? Because...if so...then I love it~ {{champion:17}}
